title: Uhh
body:
So, today, I'm very bored.
How r u 2day?

replies.body:
Pretty good,

Excited to see how Chiefs do on game 2 of the IWCQ. OCE TO WORLDS #THEDREAM (http://na.lolesports.com/iwc/2015/2015iwcqualifierturkey/overview)

Also looking foward to our O[ceanic University Championship](http://oce.lolesports.com/articles/university-final-approaches)

I'm banned in game so I'm just chilling.

Thank you for asking.
